name: Just Hit The Button
description:
Just Hit the Button is an incredibly simple arcade game where the only task is to press the buttons. It sounds easy, right? But there will be a unique challenge along the way. Test your reflexes and see if you can master the art of button-hitting in this addictive and straightforward game!

FEATURES

  • 30 levels, you can beat in seconds.
  • Leaderboard
  • One music track and like 3 sound effects.
